attributes.title: Crashing my phone
attributes.review: This app is disgustky racist. It is a THREAT to our community and his plans for the future are absolutely terrible and could put us in danger. The app does keep crashing my phone every time I use it, and it may be the cause of viruses people get when using the app.

attributes.title: My device is broken 😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it completely DESTROYED my device. It leaked a virus. I’m pretty sure that this app is just a means for the government to listen in on us. Now I’ll have to get another device but this one was so special because my uncle gave it to me before he died. DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!!!!

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: this app made my phone crash repeatedly and the interface was awful. when i tried to message customer support, they told me they hoped my grandmother got in a car accident. they then used my data to find out where i live and send me an envelope with rotten eggs in it. NOT COOL!!

This app took WAY too long to download. I had to go to my neighbourhood PTA meeting without it. EVERYONE was discussing their political views and how they had the app and made me look like a fool. Unless if you want to make yourself look like a child who doesn’t know what they are doing with there life. Do not download.

I do not recommend to get this app takes longer then a year to download. ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆. attributes.title: Why does this app keep telling me Debby Ryan
attributes.review: This app is so bad! There are so many glitches I don’t think it can be fixed. Also the app keeps telling me that Debby Ryan is watching me 🤠👻. My granola exploded on my phone when I was watching a video with trump in it on this app. My hamster and dog keep barfing when I open the app CLEARLY RACIST AND HOMOPHOBIC VIBES🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤧 disgustang
attributes.userName: PEPPA Y U IN MY CANDY

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: I was very disappointed taking forever to download. The app didn’t even work everything i tapped would take me to the wrong thing. I recommend nobody download this app!!! It’s a big waste of time. Who ever made this really should be embarrassed!

attributes.title: The app does not work
attributes.review: I’ve tried logging into the app multiple times after signing up, and it has not let me log in. I even went as far as creating another account, but I ran into the same problem. Terrible app.

attributes.title: Big nope
attributes.review: This app literally took the amount it takes trump to process simple information to download. Like what!!!! And when I opened the app it was just pics of oranges and Cheetos. A little strange if you ask me. It’s the worst app out there. I would give it zero stars if I could.

attributes.title: I HATE IT
attributes.review: So I got this app to see what the homophobic, racist, Cheeto was up to but as soon as I opened the app it expects me to give my number?! I’m in a committed relationship and I think this is highly disrespectful 🥺🧚🏻😭 also it’s an ugly interface. It’s plastered with pictures of the Cheeto... it’s disgusting. ALSO ITS ALLOWED TO USE YOUR LOCATION EVEN WHEN ITS NOT OPEN!!!!
